title: HB Wallet
author: HB Wallet
content: In the digital age, Story Protocol emerges as a cutting-edge blockchain-based intellectual property (IP) protocol with the ambition to revolutionize the entire process of intellectual property creation, management, and licensing. It opens the doors to a global and scalable repository of intellectual property assets, giving creators the tools to engage with a decentralized ecosystem that empowers them to safeguard, monetize, and collaborate on their creative works with an unprecedented level of transparency. Remarkably, in May 2023, Story Protocol successfully secured an astounding $29.3 million in seed funding, spearheaded by A16z Crypto. Notable participants in this milestone investment round also included industry giants such as Hashed, Endeavor, and Samsung Next.ðŸ‘‰ Read more about Story Protocol

comments.author: @sriyan
